name: Houman Fardin
description: In his role as Wealthfront's VP of Business Development, Houman works closely with partners to help Wealthfront build the best products for our clients. Prior to Wealthfront, Houman led North America SMB Sales & Operations at Dropbox. Before Dropbox, Houman founded MemorialPath, an online funeral business. He did this after spending 13 years at Morgan Stanley in Investment Banking and Institutional Equities. Houman holds an MBA from Harvard Business School and BS from Yale University.
